compgc01

Class BookingHistoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • compgc01.BookingHistoryController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class BookingHistoryController
extends Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The controller for the Booking History Scene. Implementing the interface Initializable, so that the method initialize gets read at load time.
    Since:
    12.12.2017
    Author:
    Team 3: Filippos Zofakis and Lucio D'Alessandro
